The review is jointly lead by researchers from the University of Bristol and Swansea University. It is a collaborative effort involving colleagues from the Universities of Cork, Oxford, Manchester, Glasgow, and Ulster.

<img src="figures/colab_unis.png" alt="" width = "80%">

<br>

## Involved groups and collaborations

In Bristol, the work represents a collaboration between the [NIHR Applied Research Collaboration West](https://arc-w.nihr.ac.uk/) and the [NIHR Bristol Biomedical Research Centre](https://www.bristolbrc.nihr.ac.uk/), with the systems infrastructure developed by members of the [Bristol Appraisal and Review of Research group](http://www.bristol.ac.uk/population-health-sciences/centres/cresyda/barr/). 

In Swansea, the work is an activity of the [Suicide and Self Harm Satellite](https://cmd.cochrane.org/satellites) of the Cochrane Common Mental Disorders Group.

Additionally, some researchers in our team are members of the International Covid-19 Suicide Prevention Research Collaboration.
